product_name: C.A.M.P. USA Small Fixed Pulley - Brass Bushing
long_description: This C.A.M.P. USA small fixed pulley with brass bushing features fixed side plates that make it ideal for quickly rigging a hauling system with an ascender. Aluminum side plates connect at the bottom for a stable rigging system that has a breaking strength of 20kN. Fixed side plates allow quick installation on a rope and attachment to an ascender. Requires a locking oval or HMS carabiner; cannot be used with a D-shaped carabiner. Accepts ropes up to 12mm in diameter.
short_description: This C.A.M.P. USA small fixed pulley with brass bushing features fixed side plates that make it ideal for quickly rigging a hauling system with an ascender.
